statements: UPDATE traffic_patterns SET location = 'Downtown', vehicle_count = 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE traffic_patterns SET congestion_level = 'High', timestamp = '2021-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE location = 'Highway';
UPDATE traffic_patterns SET congestion_level='High', vehicle_count=100 WHERE location='Downtown' AND timestamp='2022-10-20 08:00:00';
UPDATE traffic_patterns SET vehicle_count=50, congestion_level='Medium' WHERE id=5;
UPDATE traffic_patterns SET congestion_level = 3 WHERE intersection_id = 1;
UPDATE emissions_data SET vehicle_type = 'Electric' WHERE vehicle_id = 5;
UPDATE traffic_patterns SET congestion_level = 3, traffic_flow = 50 WHERE intersection_id = 101;
UPDATE emissions_data SET emission_rate = 0.04, vehicle_type = 'SUV' WHERE vehicle_id = 205;
UPDATE TrafficPatterns SET traffic_volume = 500 WHERE location_id = 1;
UPDATE CongestionData SET congestion_cause = 'Accident' WHERE location_id = 2;
UPDATE TrafficPatterns SET location_name = 'Downtown', traffic_volume = 500 WHERE location_id = 1;
UPDATE CongestionData SET congestion_cause = 'Accident', congestion_time = '2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE data_id = 3;
UPDATE traffic_patterns SET congestion_level = 'High' WHERE location = 'City Center';
UPDATE transportation_flows SET vehicle_count = 25 WHERE route_id = 101;
UPDATE traffic_patterns SET congestion_level = 'High' WHERE location = 'Highway A' AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01 08:00:00';
UPDATE transportation_flows SET vehicle_count = 150 WHERE route_id = 101 AND timestamp <= '2022-02-15 12:00:00';
UPDATE traffic_data SET speed_mph = 60 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE congestion_data SET congestion_level = 3, weather_conditions = 'Clear' WHERE location = 'Downtown';
UPDATE traffic_data SET speed_mph = 65 WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE emissions_data SET co2_emissions = 15.75, location = 'Downtown' WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
